title: SQL ServerREVERSE()Function

metadata.description: Learn about SQL ServerREVERSE()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Reverse a string:
SELECT REVERSE('SQL Tutorial');

Definition and Usage
The REVERSE() function reverses a string and returns the result.
Syntax
REVERSE(
string
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. The string to reverse
Technical Details
Works in:
SQL Server (starting with 2008), Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Data 
  Warehouse, Parallel Data Warehouse
More Examples
Example
Reverse the text in CustomerName:
SELECT REVERSE(CustomerName)
FROM Customers;

❯
★
+1
